post_content: I hung out with Karen yesterday going out to the mall to start my Christmas shopping (well, and to find something me too). I don't think I can buy too many gifts yet since I will be flying up to my parent's new place in New York. Thats a good enough excuse for me to do last minute shopping :). We also went to see Ocean's 12. Neither of us knew that it was out already, it must have premiered last week sometime. I though Ocean's 11 was great and was excited about the sequel, but I didn't think that the sequel would be anything good. Fortunately, I was wrong. I'm not sure if the second movie topped the first, but I think it came pretty close. I'd like to say more but I don't want to give anything away, go out and see it!
